description.p: WaveControl allows you to control slide presentations using simple hand gestures captured by your webcam. No need for keyboards, remote controls, or clickers - just wave your hand to navigate through your slides.

ul.li: Gesture-based slide control: 1 finger = next slide, 2 fingers = previous slide
Real-time hand detection using MediaPipe AI
Modern GTK3 interface with live camera preview
Temporal filtering for stable gesture recognition
Compatible with any presentation software (PowerPoint, LibreOffice, etc.)

description.p: Perfect for presentations, lectures, or any situation where you need hands-free slide navigation. Simply position your hand in front of the camera and make gestures to control your presentation.
